title: Betesports
author: Betesports
content: Hello!Just to mention here that 7slots.casino is totally scam and they will not pay you. Since 19th of September I'm asking for just 99 usd but they are not paying me and no reason whatsoever. My account is fully verified. Deposit-only site. Not even responding on live chat.https://imgur.com/a/r7Qzom2

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I have not heard about this casino before. Not having any official thread or official account on this forum. I will advise you to use a good gambling site on this forum, the ones that people are not accusing of any issue. If you stay on this forum, you will see many of them. Go to gambling board to see many gambing sites with active official thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=56.0

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Betesports on October 13, 2023, 07:41:42 AMYou are right. But deposited a small amount after checking on casino.guru where they have a good rating. The best is to make your own personal research which might take some days weeks and months, and if you are present very well on a forum like Bitcointalk, you will know more about gambling sites. Just be in gambling board and scam accusation and reputation board.Know that review sites can be very fake and not all are true. As I have been in this forum now, I know the gambling site that I can use and the ones that I can not use.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Use this report format, and I think you will at least be more detailed in your history of not being able to withdraw funds. Haven't you played any games before withdrawing yet?They also have a representative on the casino.guru site, haven't you tried discussing your problem with him?

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I have not heard about this casino before neither have I seen them before and I don't think they are here on bitcointalk platform. They are just some random casino out there but not to mention, OP you have no much evidence here to back up your claims. You claimed they owe you money how much did you deposit with them? What games did you play with them to gain $99 which you claimed to make withdraw. Present concrete information and evidence here so that members can intercede on your behalf otherwise you have no or case at hand.

I see that their rating at Guru Casino is very high, reaching 7.9/10, but haven't you seen that there are so many comments complaining about withdrawal problems and also accounts being randomly banned?  This is a lesson for you, I hope your problem is resolved soon, and never play and make deposits at any online casino again, it's better for you to only play on online casino sites that have an ann thread on this forum and have been reviewed by many senior members here.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: You have been here for more than three years which makes me wonder why you chose to play at this casino that no one here has heard of and that doesn't even have an announcement thread on this forum. You are also supposed to know that reviews on casino guru and the likes doesn't mean much and shouldn't be trusted.I've checked your post history and it seems this is not the first casino you're having issues with! Are you by any chance from a restricted country or we're gambling is prohibited?

comments.author: Text
comments.body: It's unfortunate when you come across such unreliable platforms. It's crucial to be cautious when dealing with online casinos and gambling sites, as not all review sites are trustworthy. You've been trying to withdraw your funds for over a month now, and you're still having trouble which is a big red flag, other players should avoid this casino. Have you tried emailing the casino directly?Being active on this forum can help you make more informed decisions when it comes to choosing a gambling platform. Gathering information and insights from experienced users is a wise approach to avoid scams and find reputable sites. And it’s always best to cross-verify information from multiple sources.Glad that you share your experience to help others steer clear of potential scams.
